SR-2012-11.nameGOVUK: Anaerobic digestion facility including use of the resultant biogas
SR-2012-11.friendlyName: Anaerobic digestion facility including use of biogas
SR-2012-11.friendlyWeight: Over 100 tonnes per day and up to 100,000 tonnes per year and 5MW thermal input
SR-2012-11.WAMITAB: WAMITAB Level 4 Medium Risk Operator Competence for Anaerobic Digestion (601/8515/6) (MROC5) and WAMITAB Level 4 Certificate in Waste and Resource Management (601/2388/6) (VRQ, Unit 6b)
